section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This subchapter may be cited as the “Open Meetings Act”.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 31, 2011, D.C. Law 18-350, § 2, 58 DCR 734

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 1-1161.01, § 10-1906, and § 31-3171.11.
